scripts.requirements: yarn global add parcel cross-env shx
scripts.prebuild:prod: shx mkdir -p prod && shx cp -r src/static prod
scripts.watch:prod: yarn clean:prod && yarn prebuild:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel watch --dist-dir prod src/index.html --no-cache --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-hmr
scripts.build:prod: yarn clean:prod && yarn prebuild:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir prod --no-cache --public-url ./ --no-source-maps
scripts.prebuild: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r src/static dist
scripts.watch: yarn clean && yarn prebuild && parcel watch --dist-dir dist src/index.html --no-cache --public-url ./ --no-source-maps --no-hmr
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn prebuild && parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir dist --no-cache --public-url ./ --no-source-maps
